content:
All the backgrounds for Omarchy live in ~/.config/omarchy/[theme]/backgrounds. If you want to add an extra background image to, say, the nord theme, you just put the file in ~/.config/omarchy/nord/backgrounds.

~/.config/omarchy/[theme]/backgrounds

~/.config/omarchy/nord/backgrounds

You can do this most easily by going to Install > Style > Background in the Omarchy Menu. That'll bring up the folder where the backgrounds for that theme is stored. Hit Super + Shift + F to start another file manager, find your background, copy it over.  Now it'll be included in the cycle of backgrounds you can move between using Super + Ctrl + Space.

You can find a huge collection of cool curated backgrounds on https://github.com/dharmx/walls.
